definition: An adjustment to a line; arrangement in a straight line or in correct relative positions.

definition: Agreement or harmony; the quality of coinciding exactly when superimposed.
wrongDef: The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way; an unplanned fortunate discovery.

definition: The fact of two things being seen or placed close together with contrasting effect.
